title: Pidcock Comes Up Short in Liège-Bastogne-Liège as Pogačar Soars Again: ‘I Didn’t Have the Gas’
content:
Pidcock leaves the Ardennes empty-handed and will reload for the Giro d'Italia: 'Quite disappointed about that actually.'

Read the full article at Pidcock Comes Up Short in Liège-Bastogne-Liège as Pogačar Soars Again: ‘I Didn’t Have the Gas’ on Velo.
author: ahood
